Just to be clear - you used the eclipse update mechanism and NOT the full download zip?

Yep, I used the update, according to "http://www.eclipse.org/eclipse/platform-
releng/updatesfor3.1.1.html"

We've seen this kind of behavior when use the zip and simply install over their old eclipse but never when 
using the update mechanism.  Did the update finish successfully?

Sorry, I should have mentioned that; no, the update did not finish 
successfully. Unfortunatly, I can't recall the error message....
Is there anything else in your log file before the stack components you've already posted?

Created an attachment (id=29315)
The log file of my workspace...

Having done a manual install (extracting the zip file over my existing 
installation), eclipse 3.1.1 works OK.

Looks like the bug has something to do with the update mechanism...
